column13: Second-hand; modernized in Portugal before delivery

Officially delivered for civil use but taken over by Navy
Second-hand but only used for few years by Jordan; aid

Second-hand; AGM-65B version for A-4K combat aircraft

Second-hand; loan during 1971 India-Pakistan war (returned to Jordan 1972)
Second-hand; incl 3 F-16B version; $75 m deal
PHP5.5b ($104 m) 'Air Surveillance Radar System' programme; partly paid by aid from Japan

KV-107-II-2 version; 1 more delivered for government VIP transport
Leased from Belgian or Luxemburg civilian owner immediately after production in Japan

Incl for use by state oil company ANCAP for commercial use
